name: Dice of the Deep
description:
Collect dice to roll your stats in this action roguelite! Info:

Leveling up grants you a dice -- use the dice to add to your stats. Upon dying, you can roll to keep some of your stats. Try to reach the end of the depths!

Controls:
  • WASD - move
  • Left Click - melee attack
  • Right Click - fireball
  • TAB - open roll menu
  • Space - open doorCredits:
Credits:
  • somepx - fonts
  • XYEzawr - VFX
  • o_lobster - art assets
  • Aleksandr Makarov - art assets
  • Sam - art assets

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
